GTYPES.item: TYPES: gtt_tour TYPE TABLE OF zyt_per_toursv2.

GCODING.item: DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM gt_tour_copy COMPARING kisi_id gid_yer.
LOOP AT gt_tour INTO gs_tour WHERE kisi_id = gs_tour_copy-kisi_id
READ TABLE gt_info_sf INTO gs_info_sf WITH KEY kisi_id = gs_tour-kisi_id.
APPEND gs_tables TO gt_tables. CLEAR gs_tables.
